article: A teenager loved football very much. Practice after practice, he eagerly gave everything he had. But being half the size of the other boys, he didn't make progress.  He lived alone with his father. The two of them had a very special relationship. Even though he sat on the bench and hardly ever played at all the games, his father was always in the stands cheering. He _ missed a game! All through high school the young man never missed practice or a game, but38 _ a bench-warmer because of his _ body. When he went to college , he decided to try out for the football team. Everyone was _ he could never make it, but he did. The news _ him so much that he _ to the nearest phone and called his father. His father _ his excitement and was given tickets for all the college games. This young man never _ practice during his four years at college, _ he never got to play in the game. One day, the coach met him with a _ . After reading the telegram he said to the coach, "My father _ this morning. Can I miss practice today?" The coach said, "Take the rest of the week _ , son. And don't even plan to come back to the game on _ ." Then Saturday arrived, and the game was not going well. To the _ of the coach and his players, their _ teammate came back! He insisted on playing, and finally the coach gave in . Before long, this little unknown was doing _ right. His team won at last. The coach came to him and said, " Kid, I can't believe it. _ me how you did it." He looked at the coach, with tears in his eyes, and said , " Well, you knew my dad died, but did you know that my dad was blind? Dad came to all my games, but today was the first time he could see me play, and I wanted to show him I could do it!"
